text: was a Japanese politician. He was a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. He was a member of the House of Representatives. He was born in Neyagawa, Osaka. He was an MP from 2003 to 2009 and again from 2012 until his death 2018. Kitagawa died on December 26, 2018 in Osaka of complications from peritonitis, aged 67.北川知克元環境副大臣が死去 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Official website in Japanese. title: Tomokatsu Kitagawa
